summary: With a master degree in business administration and more than ten years of experience in the logistics and supply chain industry. I am a pro-active and result oriented person with teamwork spirit. My experience working with cross-functional, international teams has taught me the importance of building trusted relationships and inspiring a shared vision

profile_positions.description:
• Help define and deploy the correct warehouse and distribution setup within the region, ensuring assessment, selection, contracting, and management of 3PL relationships, in conjunction with Procurement and key business stakeholders. 
• Guide operational implementations and develop new areas of business. 
• Identify opportunities for service excellence, continuous improvement, and innovation within the 3PL relationships. 
• Optimize and improve service and cost levels, and work with inventory team to ensure product lifecycle management and adherence to inventory management strategies. 
• Work cross-functionally with Procurement, Customer Service, and Country Directors to secure evolving market needs can be supported within distribution framework. 
• Collaborate in close link with Demand Planning, Inbound Logistics, and Inventory teams to manage demand and supply exceptions, and escalate issues where necessary. Act as focal point within the organization. 
• Drive Key Metrics: service delivery (OTIF), inventory accuracy, and 3PL financial performance. 
• Work closely with Global Inventory Manager to reconcile monthly stock levels, transactions, and coordination of EOY Physical Inventory. 
• Act as functional lead in corporate transformation projects
